item.title: Interactive Timelines of Nutrition, Food and Health
item.description: Next, we decided to establish a basic timeline of major events in the nutrition sciences over time. We decided to break this down into three distinct timelines based on science, politics and the social. Here is the science timeline… + - {"x":{"items":[{"id":"10","content":"Framingham Heart Study","start":"1948","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science","source":"Wikipedia"},{"id":"11","content":"Household Food Consumption Survey","start":"1965","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science"},{"id":"12","content":"Ten State Nutrition Survey","start":"1968","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science"},{"id":"13","content":"National Health and Nutrition Examiniation Survey","start":"1971","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science","source":"Wikipedia"},{"id":"14","content":"Nutrition research shifts to \"omics\" research","start":"1990","end":"2019","group1":"3","group":"3","groups":"3","final":"final","domain":"Science"},{"id":"15","content":"Scientific replication crisis"

item.title: Text Network of 1969 WHC Report
item.description: In this paper,… First, we decided to get a basic idea of what was talked about in the 1969 White House Conference. To do this, we did a basic word frequency count, examined the text for bigrams (i.e. the most commonly occuring words that arise next to each other in the text), and then graphed those bigram relations using network analysis. Here are the 10 most commonly occuring words…
